009package Ch15_Color_Filters;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear.VectorMedianFilterSharpen;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear.VectorMedianFilterSharpen.Parameters;
017import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
018import imagingbook.common.math.VectorNorm.NormType;
019import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
020
021import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
022
023/**
024 * <p>
025 * This plugin applies a sharpening vector median filter to a RGB color image. See Sec. 15.2.3 of [1] for details.
026 * </p>
027 * <p>
028 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
029 * (2022).
030 * </p>
031 * @author WB
032 *
033 * @version 2022/12/10
034 */
035public class MedianFilter_VectorSharpen implements PlugInFilter {
036
037        private static Parameters params = new VectorMedianFilterSharpen.Parameters();
038        static {
039                params.radius = 3;
040                params.sharpen = 0.5;
041                params.threshold = 0.0;
042                params.distanceNorm = NormType.L1;
043        }
044        private ImagePlus im;
045
046        /**
047         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
048         */
049        public MedianFilter_VectorSharpen() {
050                if (noCurrentImage()) {
051                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.ColorTest3);
052                }
053        }
054        
055    @Override
056        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
057        this.im = im;
058        return DOES_RGB;
059    }
060
061    @Override
062        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
063        if (!runDialog())
064                return;
065        VectorMedianFilterSharpen filter = new VectorMedianFilterSharpen(params);
066        filter.applyTo(ip);
067 //     IJ.log("Pixels modified: " + filter.modifiedCount + " of " + (ip.getPixelCount()));
068    }
069    
070    boolean runDialog() {
071                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Median Filter");
072                gd.addNumericField("Radius", params.radius, 1);
073                gd.addNumericField("Sharpen", params.sharpen, 1);
074                gd.addNumericField("Threshold", params.threshold, 1);
075                gd.addEnumChoice("Distance norm", params.distanceNorm);
076//              gd.addCheckbox("Mark modified pixels", params.markModifiedPixels);
077//              gd.addCheckbox("Show mask", params.showMask);
078                
079                gd.showDialog();
080                if (gd.wasCanceled())
081                        return false;
082
083                params.radius = Math.max(gd.getNextNumber(),0.5);
084                params.sharpen = gd.getNextNumber();
085                params.threshold = gd.getNextNumber();
086                params.distanceNorm = gd.getNextEnumChoice(NormType.class);
087//              params.markModifiedPixels = gd.getNextBoolean();
088//              params.showMask = gd.getNextBoolean();
089                return true;
090    }
091}
092
